description:
Kensington Konnect™ optimizes your productivity with future-forward options, such as one-click access to AI tools like Copilot, ChatGPT, and Gemini to automate tasks, generate content, and streamline your workflow.

Keyboards should be customizable to enhance your productivity. Use Kensington Konnect™ software to streamline your workflow and automate repetitive tasks. Personalize your experience by programming keys and buttons. Assign a dedicated shortcut to launch your preferred AI application, create macros, adjust key mappings, manage profiles, and more—all at the click of a button.
